changeCompanyDataForm.additionalInvoiceRecipientDesc: If the invoice should not be sent to you but to the billing department or other recipients of your company, please enter the contact data here.

companyIdentificationNumber.description: Please enter (without spaces) the correct VAT number / tax number of your company (may differ from the country where your company is located).
companyIdentificationNumber.title: National identification number

companyPhoneNumber.hint: Please enter the phone number with country code prefix (e.g. +44 18081570192 or 44 18081570192)
companyPhoneNumber.label: Phone number

changeCompanyDataForm.description: Here you can edit and save the data you have entered for your company. Please note that the data provided must be truthful and up to date.
changeCompanyDataForm.noCompanyAssigned: Your account is not associated with a company
changeCompanyDataForm.title: Company data
changeCompanyDataForm.updateFailed: Your company data could not be updated
changeCompanyDataForm.updateSuccessMessage: Your company data has been updated.

changeLanguageForm.description: Here you can set the language in which the email correspondence should take place.
changeLanguageForm.label: Edit language of correspondence
changeLanguageForm.notification: Your language setting has been updated.
changeLanguageForm.title: Edit language of correspondence

changePasswordForm.description1: Set a new password for your account. After choosing a new password enter your old password for confirmation.
changePasswordForm.description2: To conform with our Strong Password Policy, you are required to use a sufficiently strong password. Your Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain upper- and lower-case, a number and a special character.
changePasswordForm.oldPasswordHelpText: Please enter your old password for confirmation
changePasswordForm.title: Password

editAccountForm.description: Here you can edit and save the data you have entered for your account. Please note that the data provided must be truthful and up to date.
editAccountForm.emailConfirmNeededHelpText: ‚ö†Ô∏è confirm please your new email address or will be ignored.
editAccountForm.emailHelpText: Attention: This is the email your company will use to log in to the EPR Registration Tool.
editAccountForm.title: Account

activation.invalidToken: The link you followed does not seem to be a valid confirmation link.

nextStepActivation.body: Before you can log in, your account must first be activated. A staff member will now check your registration information. You will receive an email as soon as you account has been activated.
nextStepActivation.title: ‚è≥ One step left ...

serverErrors.activationLinkInvalid: The confirmation link you followed is not valid anymore.

success.message: Your email address has been successfully confirmed!
success.title: Thank you!

activation.youCanLoginNow: Everything has been set up and you can now log in.

changeEmailFailed.emailExists: Another user has the same email address you are trying to change to. Please connect support for help.
changeEmailFailed.incorrectEmailEncode: Incorrect url encode. Please connect support for help.
changeEmailFailed.invalidToken: Invalid token. Please connect support for help.
changeEmailFailed.requestDoesNotExists: No request to change your email address exists.
changeEmailFailed.requestOutdated: Change request cannot be proceed after 24 hours.
changeEmailFailed.unknownError: Request failed. Unknown Error occurs, please try again later.

changeEmailConfirm.changeEmailSuccess: Your email address has been changed successfully. You have been logged out from all your devices and you can login now again with your new email address.

completionAlert.dataNeeded: Before you can submit a forecast, we still need some data from you. Please click here to complete your profile.

dashboard.noCompanyAssigned: You have not been assigned to any company

deleteReportDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this report? The data cannot be restored afterwards.

reportListSection.description: Here you can see an overview of your submitted forecasts. You can only submit one forecast per timeframe. Forecasts can be edited as long as the specified timeframe has not yet been reached.
reportListSection.headline: Packaging data reporting
reportListSection.noReportAddNow: No Reports available. Add a Report now.
reportListSection.noReportPleaseComplete: No Reports available. Complete your profile to submit a Report.
reportListSection.noResultsResetFilter: Nothing to show. Reset filter to see all reports.

uploadCompanyLogoDialog.companyLogoAlt: Preview of your company logo that you would like to be displayed on your dashboard.
uploadCompanyLogoDialog.description: Upload a logo for your company account (JPG or PNG). We recommend a resolution of at least 344 x 344 px.
uploadCompanyLogoDialog.title: Company logo

internalErrors.imageUploadError: Image upload failed. Please try with another image file.
internalErrors.unknownError: Something unexpected happened. Please reload and try again.

loginForm.changePasswordComplete: Password updated. Please sign in with your new password.
loginForm.resetPasswordRequest: If this email address was used to create an account, instructions to reset your password will be sent to you. Please check your email.
loginForm.title: Login to the EPR Registration Tool

registrationForm.emailHelpText: Attention: This is the email address your company will use to log in to the EPR Registration Tool.
registrationForm.step2Description: As a registered user you can report the data for your company to this EPR database.
registrationForm.step3Description: To comply with our strong password policy, you are required to use a sufficiently strong password. Your Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain upper- and lower-case letters, a number and a special character.

success.desc: Before you can log in, your account must be activated. You will receive an email once your data is successfully verified
success.heading: Thank you for registering
success.title: Registration successful

registrationForm.title: Title

reportForm.createReportSuccessDescription: A Forecast Report is created successfully. You can find it in your dashboard.
reportForm.packagingEntryDescription: Please enter your quantities for each material in each Packaging Group. With "+ADD NEW ENTRY" you can enter additional Packaging Groups.
reportForm.step1Description: Please select start date and duration of the report.
reportForm.step3Description: Based on your information we have calculated the following fee.
reportForm.submitActualQuantitiesForReportNoX: Submit actual quantities for Data Report No. {{reportNo}}

resetPassword.forgetPasswordDescription1: Enter the email address you used when you joined and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
resetPassword.forgetPasswordDescription2: For security reasons, we do NOT store your password. So rest assured that we will never send your password via email.
resetPassword.newPasswordDescription: To comply with our strong password policy, you are required to use a sufficiently strong password. Your password must be at least 8 characters long and contain upper- and lower-case letters, a number and a special character.

serverErrors.reset_password_link_invalid: The password reset link you tried to use is invalid. This may be due to a typo, or because it has been used already.

resetPassword.title: Reset password

serverErrors.alreadyAuthenticated: You are signed in with another account. Please log out and try again.
serverErrors.cannotSubmitFinalReportYet: Final Report cannot be submitted yet
serverErrors.companyDataNotCompleted: Please complete your company profile first.
serverErrors.emailNotConfirmed: Your email address is not confirmed yet. Please check your email inbox including the spam folder and follow the confirmation link.
serverErrors.generic403: Request failed with status code 403 (permission denied).
serverErrors.genericNetworkError: The server could not be reached. Please check your internet connection and try again.
serverErrors.identicalPasswordNotAllowed: The new password cannot be identical with the old password.
serverErrors.identificationNumberAlreadyExists: A company with this VAT / tax number has already been registered.
serverErrors.inactiveCompany: You company account has not been activated yet. You will be notified via email once this is done.
serverErrors.invalidCredentials: The credentials you provided are invalid.
serverErrors.invalidExtension: Image format not allowed. Please upload another image (JPG or PNG)
serverErrors.materialDoesNotExist: One of the selected Material does not exist
serverErrors.materialQuantityInvalidDecimal: An entry on the material quantities is invalid.
serverErrors.maximumFileSizeExceeded: The maximum image size is 2MB. Please try a smaller image file.
serverErrors.missingCompanyRelation: You cannot login because your account is not associated with a company.
serverErrors.noCompanyAssigned: You have not been assigned to any company
serverErrors.noCompanyAssignedORInactiveCompany: You have not been assigned to any company or your company account has not been activated yet.
serverErrors.packagingGroupDoesNotExist: One of the selected Packaging Groups does not exist
serverErrors.permissionDenied: You have no permission to perform this action.
serverErrors.timeframeOverlap: Report's timeframe overlaps with already existing Data report(s), please check.
serverErrors.unknownError: The server failed to handle your request. Please reload and try again.
serverErrors.userEmailDoesAlreadyExist: A user with this email address has already been registered with an existing company.
serverErrors.validationError: There seems to be a validation issue with your submitted data.

validations.atLeastOnPackagingGroup: At least one Packaging Group required
validations.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validations.forecastShouldBeInSameYear: Forecast should start and end in same year
validations.greaterThanZero: Must be bigger than zero or remove it.
validations.identicalPasswordNotAllowed: The new password cannot be identical with the old password
validations.notUniqueGroupsMaterials: This material is duplicated in this Packaging Group
validations.numberType: Please enter valid number (for decimal please use Point as separator)
validations.passwordMustHaveLowercase: The password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validations.passwordMustHaveOneNumber: The password must contain at least one number
validations.passwordMustHaveSpecialCharacter: The password must contain at least one special character, e.g., ! @ # ? ]
validations.passwordMustHaveUppercase: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validations.passwordTooShort: The password must consist of at least 8 characters
validations.reportExceedsOneYear: A report should not exceed a year
validations.reportStartDateValid: Please select valid date in format of Month Year: Jan 2024
validations.startDateMin: Date cannot be before the start of the next month
